Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc27
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc27.Model.States

Class PlayerState

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc27.Model.States.PlayerState
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
ChooseObjectiveState, DrawingState, EndingState, EndOfTurnState, InitializingState, PlayingState, WaitingState
public abstract class PlayerState extends Object implements Serializable
The PlayerState class represents the state of a player in the game's state pattern It manages actions that a player can perform based on their current state
See Also:

    • chooseObjectiveCard

      public abstract void chooseObjectiveCard(Game game, int objectiveCardIndex)
      this method allows the player to choose the personal secret objective, this last action is allowed only if the player is in ChooseObjectiveState
      Parameters:
      game - which game
      objectiveCardIndex - which Objective Card

    • drawCard

      public abstract void drawCard(Player player, boolean isGold, boolean fromDeck, int faceUpCardIndex)
      this method allows the player to draw a card from the market, this last action is allowed only if the player is in DrawingState
      Parameters:
      player - which player
      isGold - if the card drawn is gold
      fromDeck - if the card drawn is from the deck
      faceUpCardIndex - which of the two card placed face up in the market

    • addCard

      public abstract void addCard(Game game, ResourceCard resourceCard, Face face, int x, int y)
      this method allows the player to add a card to the personal manuscript, this last action is allowed only if the player is in PlayingState
      Parameters:
      game - which game
      resourceCard - the card played (gold or resource card)
      face - face up or face down
      x - position index
      y - position index

    • addStarterCard

      this method allows the player to choose the personal secret objective, this last action is allowed only if the player is in InitializingState
      Parameters:
      game - which game
      starterCard - the chosen card
      face - face up or face down
